attributes.action: create an adoption allowance for adoptivve parents the same as foster care allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to allow adoptive parents to qualify for the same rate weekly allowance as foster carers currently recive for at least the fist 6 months after they have adopted a child and had the adoption order passed in court-this is to help parents afford the transisition after all if foster carers get it why not those who are giving the child a premenant home ?this would be in addition to the settling in grant and should not be means tested on incomes of £10,000 pa or under
